verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w our|strong="G0080"\w* \w entrance|strong="G1529"\w* \w in|strong="G1096"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1096"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w our|strong="G1722"\w* \w exhortation|strong="G3874"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w error|strong="G4106"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w deceit|strong="G1388"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* approved \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w that|strong="G4100"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w should|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G2316"\w* committed \w to|strong="G2980"\w* us: even \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w pleasing|strong="G0700"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* proveth \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w have|strong="G1096"\w* \w we|strong="G1492"\w* used, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w any|strong="G4218"\w* \w time|strong="G4218"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* flattery, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*; \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w taken|strong="G1096"\w* \w an|strong="G1096"\w* occasion \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w witness|strong="G3144"\w*:

Whereas \w we|strong="G1437"\w* \w might|strong="G1410"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* burdensome \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w of|strong="G5043"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G1437"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* little ones \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* \w of|strong="G5043"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* nurse should cherish \w her|strong="G1437"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*:

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* desirous \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w would|strong="G1096"\w* \w gladly|strong="G2106"\w* \w impart|strong="G3330"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*: \w because|strong="G1360"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* most \w dear|strong="G0027"\w* unto us.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w remember|strong="G3421"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w our|strong="G2316"\w* labour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w toil|strong="G2873"\w*: working \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* chargeable \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w how|strong="G5613"\w* holily, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w justly|strong="G1346"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w without|strong="G0274"\w* \w blame|strong="G0274"\w*, \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G4100"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*:

\w We|strong="G2532"\w* testified \w to|strong="G1519"\w* every \w one|strong="G1438"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G2316"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w would|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0516"\w* \w of|strong="G0932"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* unto \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G2168"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w without|strong="G3756"\w* \w ceasing|strong="G0089"\w*: \w because|strong="G3754"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w it|strong="G1223"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* (\w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w it|strong="G1223"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*) \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* worketh \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* followers \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2453"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* coutrymen, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*,

Prohibiting \w us|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G3842"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w fill|strong="G0378"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w*: \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w come|strong="G5348"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w*.

\w For|strong="G4314"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G2532"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* hath \w hindered|strong="G1465"\w* us.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* glory? \w Are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w presence|strong="G1715"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G0846"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w*?
